name: Re Albi
description:
Game made for the 7DRL Challenge 2023.

Collect resources to try and take back your castle.

Not quite proud of it but wanted to submit it nonetheless, I've used a simple noise texture to generate a random map, and then randomly generated valid position for point of interest. I think I mostly lacked a clear direction in what I wanted to do, but I've learned a lot and got to get used to Godot 4.0.

I tried to implement the core traditional roguelike but took none of the things that make them interesting, I probably took not enough time to really think of their meaning and their use, hopefully I'll do better next time.
